borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a replacement rear roof extension;erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of the existing back addition, following the demolition of existing single storey rear and side extensions; removal of 2no. existing rooflights, installation of 2no. rooflights, and replacement of existing tiles with new tiles in the front roofslope; replacement of all existing windows with new triple glazed timber windows to the front elevation; removal and bricking-up 1no. existing window, re-sizing and replacement of 3no. existing windows with new double glazed windows to the side elevation, replacement of 1no. existing window, removal and bricking-up 1no. existing window, re-sizing and replacement of 1no. existing window with new double glazed windows to the rear elevation at first floor level; installation of a rooflight on top of the pitched roof of existing first floor back addition; installation of an air conditioning unit at ground floor level adjacent to the proposed single storey rear extension; installation of a new timber door with fixed glazing above to replace existing, installation of a new timber access gate to replace existing to the front elevation, and installation of a new access door to the side elevation of the main building at ground floor level; erection of a bin store in the front garden; alterations to the front boundary wall to include, removal of an existing metal access gate and blocking off in new brickwork and coping, and instal a new metal access gate to replace existing; lowering of the rear ground floor level; excavation of the front and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the creation of a new basement; erection of an external staircase with glass balustrade above, leading from the rear garden into the proposed rear lightwell; erection of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden and landscaping.
